LIGHT: Prefer well-lit main roads; skip parks/laneways after midnight.
If a block looks dim, add one block over to stay in shopfront light.
COMPANY: Move toward people: venues, late-open grocers, taxi ranks.
If you can, walk the last blocks while on a call with a buddy.
VENUE: Identify a staffed venue on your way (servo, 24/7 chemist).
If you need to wait, do it where staff can see you.
TRANSPORTATION: Wait near PSO/driver or in the most populated carriage/stop zone.
Stand under the brightest cameraâ€™d area; avoid empty platforms.
EMERGENCY: Keep 000 / 106 / 112 ready; know nearest Safe Haven & helplines.
Agree on a check-in time with a friend before you head off.
NAVIGATION: Landmarks help: main roads, big intersections, tram spines.
Pre-decide a turn-back point; no shame in rerouting.
BATTERY: Under 30%? Lower screen brightness; close battery-heavy apps.
Save a quick SMS draft instead of using data-heavy messengers.
AWARE: Keep one ear free; scan ahead at corners & doorways.
Hold keys/phone ready; avoid bag rummaging while walking.
